meanings.definition: Relating to or characterized by atomism.
meanings.sent1: The scientist used an atomistic approach to study the smallest particles.
meanings.sent2: The atomistic theory suggests that everything is made up of tiny, indivisible units.
meanings.sent3: In the atomistic world of Lego, each block is essential for building a masterpiece.
meanings.sent4: Her mind worked in an atomistic way, breaking down complex problems into simple components.
meanings.sent5: The artist painted an atomistic picture, capturing the intricate details of each atom.

meanings.sent1: The necklace was made of atomistic beads strung together.
meanings.sent2: The company had an atomistic structure with each department working independently.
meanings.sent3: The atomistic puzzle pieces fit perfectly together to reveal a hidden image.
meanings.sent4: His thoughts were atomistic, each idea standing alone without connection to the next.
meanings.sent5: The garden was an atomistic paradise, with each flower blooming in its own space.
